title: r/Insaneparents I Make My Kids Drink Their Own...
description:
r/Insaneparents I've covered a lot of crazy parents on this channel, but the parents in today's video are the craziest of the craziest. The father in the first story wants to cast some sort of evil vampire Christian spell on OP that sucks out his life force so that the father can literally become younger. We've also got a mom who forces her kids to drink their own... well, you'll just have to listen to that one for yourself. If you like this podcast and want to see more, hit the follow button for more daily Reddit podcasts!
